Package it.polimi.it.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Class used to Store the information about a single match and its players.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Integer numplayers, User host, int gameID, VirtualView virtualView)
      Constructor method of the Game class
      Parameters:
      numplayers - is the number of the players who joined the game,
      host - is the player that created the game,
      gameID - is the unique ID of this game,
      virtualView - is the connection to the network's VirtualView interface.
